definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.chinese: 事故发生后，一个后轮发生了爆胎。

sentences.english: It pivots high in the aluminum frame to maximize rear wheel traction.
sentences.chinese: 它在铝支点架高，以最大限度地提高后轮的牵引力。

sentences.english: The steady response to angle input of front and rear wheels is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了汽车对前后轮角输入时的稳态响应特性。

sentences.english: ESP intervenes and brakes the right rear wheel while at the same time reducing engine torque.
sentences.chinese: ESP干预制动右后轮同时减小发动机扭矩。

sentences.english: An extra wheel mounted to its frame spun backwards and canceled out the gyro effect.
sentences.chinese: 他在后轮的车架上安装了一个附加轮以抵消陀螺效应。

sentences.english: Front and rear caliper bracket is different.
sentences.chinese: 卡钳和片式的前后轮采用不同。

sentences.english: The wheels of her bicycle were out of kilter after it hit the tree.
sentences.chinese: 她的自行车撞上树后，前后轮失去了均衡。

sentences.english: Sprinkle system, water sprayed smoothly on roll faces.
sentences.chinese: 设有洒水装置，前后轮面喷洒均匀。

sentences.english: The car gets its power from 2 electric motors in the rear wheels.
sentences.chinese: 汽车动力来自于后轮的两个电动引擎。

sentences.english: When extra power is required, the flywheel is connected to the car’s rear wheels.
sentences.chinese: 当需要额外动力时，飞轮会连接上汽车的后轮。

sentences.english: These are all AWD but RWD options will also be available.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是全轮驱动，但后轮选择也可用。
将扰流板安装在后轮上。

sentences.english: The hind wheel of it was shot down. And its door was off the hinges.
sentences.chinese: 它的后轮被击落，而且它的门也跟合页脱开了。

sentences.english: This enables racers to run their rear tires almost down to the rim if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 这使得车手运行后轮轮胎几乎到边，如果必要的。

sentences.english: Rear wheels are designed with zero to slight toe-in, depending on the vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 后轮设计与零至轻微脚趾中，在车辆上而定。

sentences.english: An automobile moves when the motor is geared to the rear wheels.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的发动机连于后轮时，汽车即动。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
